dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, big news out of the Senate this week, uh, Host_B. They've just approved this, like, major agreement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, big news out of the Senate this week, uh, Host_B. They've just approved this, like, major agreement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Senate, at a plenary session, approved the ratification of an agreement between Kazakhstan and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) for a loan amounting to 46 billion tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh really? What's it all about? Spill the beans!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh really? What's it all about? Spill the beans!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's between Kazakhstan and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development – the IBRD. And it's for a pretty hefty loan, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's between Kazakhstan and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development - the I B R D. And it's for a pretty hefty loan, actually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Senate, at a plenary session, approved the ratification of an agreement between Kazakhstan and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) for a loan amounting to 46 billion tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A loan? How hefty are we talking? And what's it even for?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A loan? How hefty are we talking? And what's it even for?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: We're talking 46 billion tenge. And it's all to support this project called, um, "Accelerated Digitalization for an Inclusive Economy of Kazakhstan."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: We're talking forty six billion tenge. And it's all to support this project called, um, Accelerated Digitalization for an Inclusive Economy of Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Senate, at a plenary session, approved the ratification of an agreement between Kazakhstan and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) for a loan amounting to 46 billion tenge. The loan will support the project Accelerated Digitalization for an Inclusive Economy of Kazakhstan...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, 46 billion tenge is no small change. [overlaps] "Accelerated Digitalization"—
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, forty six billion tenge is no small change. Accelerated Digitalization-

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: —for an Inclusive Economy. So, what does that actually *mean* they're going to do with that money?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: -for an Inclusive Economy. So, what does that actually mean they're going to do with that money?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Basically, it's about building sustainable digital infrastructure, and crucially, getting high-speed internet to folks in rural areas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Basically, it's about building sustainable digital infrastructure, and crucially, getting high-speed internet to folks in rural areas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The loan will support the project Accelerated Digitalization for an Inclusive Economy of Kazakhstan, aimed at developing a sustainable digital infrastructure and ensuring access to high-speed internet for rural residents.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's huge! So, like, really closing that digital divide for everyone, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's huge! So, like, really closing that digital divide for everyone, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And the project developers are saying it's gonna, like, stimulate technological growth and really boost regional economies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And the project developers are saying it's gonna, like, stimulate technological growth and really boost regional economies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to project developers, implementation of the agreement will stimulate technological growth and boost regional economies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That sounds incredibly positive. But, um, is this going to cost the national budget a fortune?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That sounds incredibly positive. But, um, is this going to cost the national budget a fortune?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nope, that's the good part! No additional funding needed from the national budget, and they don't expect any negative socio-economic impacts either.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope, that's the good part! No additional funding needed from the national budget, and they don't expect any negative socio-economic impacts either.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is noted that the project will not require additional funding from the national budget and will not cause negative socio-economic impacts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, that's a massive relief. And just to, uh, clarify for our listeners, who exactly is the IBRD again? Like, what's their background?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, that's a massive relief. And just to, uh, clarify for our listeners, who exactly is the I B R D again? Like, what's their background?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so the IBRD is, uh, essentially the main lending institution of the World Bank. It's a specialized UN agency, been around since 1944.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so the I B R D is, uh, essentially the main lending institution of the World Bank. It's a specialized U N agency, been around since nineteen forty four.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) is the main lending institution of the World Bank, a specialized UN agency and intergovernmental investment institution established alongside the International Monetary Fund in 1944.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, a well-established player, then. Sounds like a really smart move for Kazakhstan's future.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a well-established player, then. Sounds like a really smart move for Kazakhstan's future.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. A big step for, you know, their inclusive growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. A big step for, you know, their inclusive growth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, getting everyone on board. Very cool.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, getting everyone on board. Very cool.
